sentences.sentence: My hubby did that for a wedding present to me!
sentences.translation: 我老公送这样我的结婚纪念礼物给我！

sentences.sentence: I've also asked for more help; hubby can vacuum and youngest son loves to do Windows.
sentences.translation: 我通常寻求更多的帮助：老公能吸尘，最小的儿子喜欢擦玻璃。

sentences.sentence: I must say that my hubby is in pretty good shape - he runs and lifts weights most days of the week.
sentences.translation: 我得说明我丈夫有着相当好的体格——他一周多数天都跑步和举重。
